SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
I, Ameya Aisling, apprentice
of the white, have returned!

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Be welcome, Ameya. Though you faced much
and more, you have returned to us safely,
just as one expects of a witch of Pulchra.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Thank you, Arch Witch. Sooo... I take it you
know what happened to me in Miyako City?
If so, who was the guy who tried to steal
my magical power?

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
His appearance was unanticipated, even by me.
Now let us waste not a moment—the Congress
of Sages must commence at once. Bring forth
the Crystal Cage, Ameya Aisling!

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Mmm... I see you have done enough
to pass your Witchterms.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Thus do I turn to our sages and say:
If there is any objection to recognizing
Ameya Aisling as a full-fledged witch,
speak now or remain forever silent.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_06.text:
I hear no objections. Then Ameya Aisling,
I hereby officially recognize you as a
full-fledged witch of Pulchra.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Thank you, Arch Witch!
And thank you, great sages!

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_08.text:
And now, I bid you continue developing your
powers as a witch of Pulchra and of the white,
that we might combat the coming Calamity.
And with that, you may go.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.text:
Ameya, my daughter.
I welcome you home.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_02.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_02.text:
I expected you might be able to push yourself
further, but considering you lost your magic
power, I suppose you did your best.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.text:
It's unfortunate that even a portion of your power has not
returned, for in Pulchra, a witch's power is proportional to
the strength of her magic. Though hardship may await you
as daughter of the White Sage, know that I will support you.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.text: ...Do you think I could have done better, LoLo?

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.text:
Oh, perhaps a bit. You were a little desperate
there when it came to reclaiming your power—
though I also understand how important it is.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_07.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_07.text: Hey, it's not like I forgot to gather mana! I wanted to get my power back right away, but in the end I just screwed everything up.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_08.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_08.text:
Now's not the time to be having yourself a little
pity party. Listen up: the fight against the Calamity
looms, and you need to start thinking about
what you can do with the power you have.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_09.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_09.text:
Yeah, yeah, you're right. I'm not an
apprentice any more—I'm a witch of
the white, and I know I can do this!

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_04.text:
I see you have gathered considerable
mana on your journey.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_02.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_02.text:
You have done well to gather such an abundance of mana
considering you have been deprived of your magic.
You might even have managed to completely fill the
Crystal Cage with mana had your powers been complete.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_04.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_04.text:
Sadly, your magic has not fully returned—and here in
Pulchra, the strength of one's magic is proof of their power.
For this reason, I suspect you will face many difficulties in
the days to come—but know I will always support you.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_05.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_05.text:
So what's gonna happen to the parts of my
power I haven't gotten back? Will they just
live on as regular old cats?

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_06.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_06.text: I couldn't say; this is my first experience with this kind of thing. Still, I would like to see someone completely fill the Crystal Cage with mana—even just once.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_010_02.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_010_02.text:
You have done well to gather such an
abundance of mana considering you had
been deprived of your magic. I admit I worried over what might transpire,
but you managed to reclaim every last bit of
your magic! I'm very proud of you.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_010_04.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_010_04.text:
That said, had you pushed just a bit harder,
you would have also managed the impressive
feat of completely filling the Crystal Cage.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_010_05.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_010_05.text:
Just had to get a little dig
in there, didn't you, Mother?

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_000_04.speaker: ArchWitch

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_000_05.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_000_05.text:
Though I expect no objections, if any
of you have reason why Ameya Aisling
should not become a full-fledged witch,
speak now or remain forever silent.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_02.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_02.text:
Incredible, Ameya! You've filled the
Crystal Cage to the brim and proven
yourself a witch worthy of praise.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_03.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_03.text:
Thanks, Mom. I'm glad I was able to go
to Miyako City. I mean, it was pretty
tough at times, but also lots of fun!

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_04.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_04.text:
I never expected things might turn out this way—
and while it's truly unfortunate that a portion
of your power has not yet returned, I'm simply
relieved you're all right.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_05.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_05.text:
Yeah, I thought I knew what it meant for a witch
to lose her power, but I clearly didn't realize what
a big deal it was. Mom seemed kind of worried.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_06.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_06.text:
That's hardly a surprise. In Pulchra, the power
of one's magic serves as proof for their overall
capabilities. I wish you had managed to find it all.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_07.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_07.text:
Yeah, me too. But hey, no use in wallowing
in despair, right? I've got the power I've got,
and I'm gonna do everything I can to protect
Pulchra with it!

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_040_CUT_010_04.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_040_CUT_010_04.text:
I never expected things might turn out this way, but you
managed to regain all your lost magic AND completely fill
the Crystal Cage with mana! You truly have grown. I'll have
to work hard to ensure you don't surpass me!

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_040_CUT_010_05.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_040_CUT_010_05.text:
I've got a looong way to go before I'm
on Mom's level—but I guess hearing
her say that means she's thinks I'm
a full-fledged witch now.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_040_CUT_010_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_040_CUT_010_06.text:
...I did it, Ren: I became a witch.
But this isn't the end! I'm gonna
work hard and do everything I can
to defend Pulchra from the Calamity!

SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_ALL_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_ALL_000_CUT_00.text:
Aw, you all came out to meet me?
That's great! Thanks!

SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_LITA_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_LITA_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm guessing from your face that you passed
your Witchterms? Nice job, bestie.
I knew you had it in you.

SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_LITA_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_LITA_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm just glad I finally
caught up with you, Lita!

SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_GRETE_000_CUT_.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_GRETE_000_CUT_.text:
I'm fine. Looks like you
are too, so that's good.

SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_GRETE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_GRETE_000_CUT_.text:
Yeah, I'm actually pretty okay, all things
considered. I mean, stuff got weird and
rough at times, but I guess it mostly
worked out in the end.

SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_WILLMA_000_CUT.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_WILLMA_000_CUT.text: I should have known you'd pass your Witchterms in one try, Ameya—but when will it be my turn to take them!?

SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_WILLMA_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_WILLMA_000_CUT.text:
Aw, you don't have to rush it, Willma.
They'll happen whenever they happen,
and I know you're gonna ace 'em!

SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_ORCHID_000_CUT.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_ORCHID_000_CUT.text:
To be honest, I was worried about whether or
not you'd be able to get the mana you needed.
Looks like my concern was for nothing.

SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_ORCHID_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_ORCHID_000_CUT.text: Wow, was everybody worried about me? Still, thanks, Red Orchid.

SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_ALL_000_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_ALL_000_CUT_01.text:
Now that you can face the Calamity as a
full-fledged witch, let's work together
to protect Pulchra!

SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_ALL_000_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_AMYA_INITIAL_ALL_000_CUT_01.text:
You know it, sister! Er, but right now,
I'm gonna head back to the Leone Bianco
Palazzo and report in to Mom.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.text:
See you the tragic state of Pulchra? Hear you the
horrid screams of your fellow witches? If nothing
changes, this world will fall to the Calamity.
There is but one means left to save it.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_02.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_02.text:
I am the Grey Witch, and you are but a witch of meager
experience. Go to the Mistkeep, young witch. A power
awaits there that even a neophyte such as yourself could
use to save Pulchra from the Calamity.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_05.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_05.text:
I heard this weird voice—she said she was the
Grey Witch or something? I'm guessing you
didn't hear it or you'd be freaking out too.
Anyway, more importantly...

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_00.text:
Wait, what? Pulchra's completely frozen,
but in...crystal? Oh no! This must be the
Calamity! Is everyone okay!?
What about Mom!? What about Lita!?

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_01.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_01.text:
Calm yourself, Ameya. Take a breath and
tell me what the Grey Witch said.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_02.text:
She said there was some power hidden
away in the Mistkeep that I could use
to save Pulchra.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_03.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_03.text:
Strange. If this power exists, why would
the Grey Witch not use it herself?
I'm suspicious of this entire affair,
Ameya. Don't believe her lies.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_04.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_04.text:
Yeah, I know. I mean, I won't.
But we've STILL got to do
something about this!

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_05.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_05.text: You have returned to us, Ameya.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_06.text:
Oh, Arch Witch! You're all right!
What's going on with all this crystal?
Is this the new form of the Calamity?

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_07.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_07.text:
There is a powerful significance to your
having returned to Pulchra at this time.
For now you must—

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_08.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_08.text:
...Arch Witch!? ...Oh no! Now even the Arch Witch has
crystallized! What am I supposed to do!? Okay, Ameya,
calm down. You can't just stand here freaking out—
you have to go check on the others.

SUB_W02_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.text:
I can use Macha's magic here in Pulchra,
LoLo. But, uh...should I?

SUB_W02_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_01.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_01.text:
This is an emergency, Ameya, and you should use
whatever tools are available against the horror of
the Calamity. But once this is over, you must tell
the Arch Witch everything.

SUB_W02_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_02.text:
I guess so, huh? Oh, and since there's
also a line leading to the Mistkeep,
it's okay for me to use that against
the Calamity too, right?

SUB_W02_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_03.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_03.text:
While we should use what tools we have, that isn't always
a good thing. The Grey Witch has marked you for some
unknown purpose, which makes me nervous. But I am
your familiar, and I won't permit that woman to use you!

SUB_W02_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_04.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_04.text: Aw, thanks for worrying about me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_000_C.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_000_C.text:
Ameya! Remember everything I said about
how the Grey Witch is trying to use you?
You really need to keep that in mind.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_000_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_000_C.text:
I know, LoLo! I just...wanted to see
what things were like here!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_000_C.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_000_C.text:
You're shaking that gate like a madwoman
for someone who just wants a look around.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_000_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_000_C.text:
Just seeing if it's locked—and hey, it is!
Doesn't seem like a simple spell of opening
is going to get the job done, either.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_000_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_000_C.text:
I don't get that Grey Witch at all.
Why would she send me to this place
if it's all locked up?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_000_C.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_000_C.text:
What are you playing at,
Grey Witch?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.text:
Grete! Red Orchid!
Oh, I'm so glad you're okay!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.text:
You're finally back, eh, Ameya? Sorry
I can't be happier about it, but right now
I'm more worried about...well, this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.text: We're in this situation because this one couldn't hold back the Calamity—and now look how the crystallization has spread.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.text:
You're right: I'm weaker than the others,
and I struggle against the Calamity's fiends.
But the difficulty of your own battles
has nothing to do with we of the Black—

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.text:
No WAY! Is this a Calamity fiend!?
You two, you've got to—

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.text:
We're only in this situation
because of YOUR failure, Grete.
This battle should be yours to fight.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.text:
But we're also on the Flame Fortress's
doorstep, which means YOU should be
the one to fend them off, Red Orchid!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.text:
Are you two kidding me right now?
Fine! I'LL fight the dang thing!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.text:
Okay, what's going on? Why are the two
of you more interested in yelling at each
other than fighting fiends?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.text:
I don't... Goodness, I can't even
remember what I was so upset
about. I'm sorry, Red Orchid.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.text:
I'm the one who should be apologizing, Grete.
There's no reason we witches can't help each
other. I shouldn't have acted the way I did.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.text:
You're right. If we only focus on protecting
our own territory, the Calamity will win the
day—so I'm going to head out and see if
anyone out there needs help.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.text:
And I'll check on some of the other colors.
Thanks for the help, Ameya.
We'll see you around.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_CU.text:
Uh, okay? So everything's peachy now?
I mean, I guess that's great and all,
but it's still seriously weird.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.text: Lita! Willma! I'm so glad you're okay!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.text:
Oh, we're not okay at ALL! The Tree of the Forever
Young has crystallized—and because its roots are
spread all over, the Dusk Pinwheel has become
trapped in a sea of crystals!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.text:
Why do you say it like it's OUR fault!?
The Dusk Pinwheel can fly, right?
Just have the stupid thing soar away! No reason to be blaming witches of
the blue for your own negligence...

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.text:
Guys? ...GUYS! A BUNCH OF
FIENDS ARE ATTACKING, GUYS! Aaand, they're not listening at all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.text:
Well, I know it's poor form to interfere with
the affairs of other colors, but since my own
home is right near here, I gotta do something!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.text:
Because you two knuckleheads
weren't listening to me at all! Also, the Leone Bianco Palazzo is near here,
and I wasn't going to stand around and let it
get destroyed because of some stupid turf war.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.text:
I... I felt like something was piercing my
chest for a moment, but it's gone now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.text:
So back to normal then?
Well, that's good to hear.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.text:
Um, Ameya? Do you know why
Lita and I were fighting?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.text:
Absolutely NO idea. I'm just
glad the two of you made up.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.text:
Well, I was trying to see how the battle was
going with the other colors when all that went
down, and since Willma seems fine, I'm gonna
get back to it. See you around!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_.text:
And I'll hold back the Calamity here.
You should check elsewhere, Ameya.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_000_CUT_00.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_000_CUT_00.text:
This battlefield is the responsibility of we
of the black—and I swear upon my staff to
help, with or without the Black Sage's power!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_000_CUT_00.text:
Ack! We've got Calamity
fiends here, too!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_000_CUT_00.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_000_CUT_00.text:
Thank you, Ameya. I can't explain what
happened, but we got distracted and
ended up being trapped in some crystal.
But I'm not going to give up!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_000_CUT_00.text:
Atta girl, Grete. Let's go show the
world what our best looks like!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_000_CUT_000.text:
The Tree of the Forever Young's roots can't be
totally crystallized—it wouldn't succumb so easily.
And neither will I, because Lita Caryx NEVER
knows when to give up!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_000_CUT_000.text:
If we take advantage of the toxicity of
Bluewood Spring, we might be able to
do some damage to the crystals.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_000_CUT_000.text: C'mon, Pierre! Let's do this thing!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_000_CUT_000.text: Guess I better get going too!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_000_CUT_0.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_000_CUT_0.text:
The compass showed my path before it was
crystallized, so I'm just trusting in that and
moving forward. Whatever my true self
might be is a secondary consideration.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_000_CUT_0.text:
Er, sorry for getting involved
in a fight on yellow territory.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_000_CUT_0.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_000_CUT_0.text:
Please don't worry about it. What kind
of person would I be if I got all bent out
of shape when someone saved my life?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_000_CUT_000_.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_000_CUT_000_.text:
Despite our numerous victories, the Calamity
managed to seize control of the battlefield.
Is this really all my power amounts to!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_000_CUT_000_.text:
Don't give in to the bad vibes, Red Orchid!
You're the strongest, and we all know it—
heck, even the Red Sage acknowledges it!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_000_CUT_000_.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_000_CUT_000_.text:
Mmm, I suppose you're right. From this
moment forth, I will put up a mighty fight
against the Calamity and do justice to the
title of Red Orchid!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_000_CUT_000_.text: Oh man, that was REALLY cool.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_000_CUT_000_.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_000_CUT_000_.text:
No flattery now, Ameya.
It'll swell my head.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_000_CUT_00.text:
As a witch of the white,
I have to do my best here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_000_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_000_CUT_00.text:
Just trust in yourself, Ameya!
You accomplished much in Miyako City,
and that was no coincidence!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, dang. I ran over here to help,
but you've already got it handled.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_000_CUT_00.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_000_CUT_00.text:
Very impressive. I think you might
surpass even the White Sage herself.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_000_CUT_00.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_000_CUT_00.text: So THAT'S how a real witch fights!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_000_CUT_00.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_000_CUT_00.text:
That was incredible, Ameya.
You've grown so much.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_000_CUT_00.text: That's just how Ameya Aisling rolls!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_100_CUT_00.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_100_CUT_00.text:
I'm not strong enough to do this!
If only I had more power...

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_100_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_100_CUT_00.text:
Don't be enticed by easy power, Grete!
There are tons of things you can do
that no one else can!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_100_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_100_CUT_00.text:
She's right, Grete. If we wield our
powers together, we'll take this thing
out without breaking a sweat!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_100_CUT_00.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_100_CUT_00.text:
Thank you for helping me, Lita...
It's okay, Ameya! We've got this!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_100_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_100_CUT_00.text:
Roger that.
Have at it, you two!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_100_CUT_000.text:
Fighting like this is going to wear us down.
How are we supposed to win when these dumb
crystals never relent and never get tired!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_100_CUT_000.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_100_CUT_000.text:
No. This fight calls for
the powers of the red.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_100_CUT_000.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_100_CUT_000.text:
With flame hot enough to melt even iron,
I shall help the witches of the blue!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_100_CUT_000.text:
Sounds like we've got this handled,
Ameya. I mean, melting iron? C'mon!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_100_CUT_000_.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_100_CUT_000_.text:
That's right. From the beginning,
the Calamity attacked the weak
points of each color of witch. And there's only one way to deal with that:
all of the colors need to fight together.
Why couldn't we just do that before?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_100_CUT_000_.text:
I was taught that during a Calamity,
each color of witch will shine in
her own way.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_100_CUT_000_.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_100_CUT_000_.text:
Like how witches of the red excel
at offense, and we of the yellow
have no defensive equal!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_100_CUT_000_.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_100_CUT_000_.text:
You're right, Willma. In order to shine
all the brighter ourselves, we should 
join forces with the other colors!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_100_CUT_000_.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_100_CUT_000_.text: Yes! Let's do this, Red Orchid!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_100_CUT_000_.text:
Sure looks like they've got
this fight under control.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_100_CUT_0.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_100_CUT_0.text:
Each time we face an enemy that resists
our attacks, it makes me worry about
whether or not we can win. I'm sure this comes from the
fact that I lack experience.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_100_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_100_CUT_0.text:
Which is why a witch of
the white is here to help!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_100_CUT_0.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_100_CUT_0.text:
Thank you, Ameya. Now I
can focus on my own fight.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_100_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_100_CUT_00.text:
Calamities are the time where witches
shine the brightest, which means
there's no need to be afraid.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_100_CUT_00.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_100_CUT_00.text:
And we of the black shall
aid you of the white!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_200_CUT_00.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_200_CUT_00.text:
My only objective now is to liberate
the Black Swan. Lend me your strength!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_200_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_200_CUT_00.text:
We're almost there, Grete! Just one last
push, and Castle Black Swan will be free!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_200_CUT_00.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_200_CUT_00.text:
Oh, I'm feeling so worn down... Let me
rest for a little while, okay, Ameya?
I'll be able to fight again after that.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_200_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_200_CUT_00.text:
You take all the time you need, Grete.
Nothing good comes from pushing yourself!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_200_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_200_CUT_000.text:
The Tree of the Forever Young is nearly ours again.
Now come on! We won't lose here!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_200_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_200_CUT_000.text:
Just leave the little ones
around here to me, Lita!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_200_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_200_CUT_000.text:
Urrrgh... I'm glad we won, but the toxicity
of Bluewood Spring is starting to get to me.
I have to get right to the Tree of the Forever Young.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_200_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_200_CUT_000.text: No worries, Lita. You go rest.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_200_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_200_CUT_000.text:
Yeah, I won't do anyone any good
if I keel over. Thanks, Ameya.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_200_CUT_000_.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_200_CUT_000_.text:
The unseemly pride I showed is a
foul stain on the honor of the red—
but I will see that error rectified!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_200_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_200_CUT_000_.text:
You don't have to do everything
yourself, Red Orchid! I'm with you!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_200_CUT_000_.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_200_CUT_000_.text: I swear this to all my crystallized witches in the Flame Fortress: though the battle ahead will be difficult, I will save you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_200_CUT_000_.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_200_CUT_000_.text:
You're right, Ameya. I will take
care not to run too hot.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_200_CUT_0.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_200_CUT_0.text:
The Dusk Pinwheel has been
robbed of its freedom, and is
now bound to the land. But the Yellow Sage says the heart of a
yellow witch must never be bound to the
earth, so I will fight for our freedom!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_200_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_200_CUT_0.text: And I'm right there with you!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_200_CUT_0.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_200_CUT_0.text:
So close... We're so close, but we
haven't reached the Dusk Pinwheel...

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_200_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_200_CUT_0.text:
You've got this, Willma! Come on!
We'll fight together to the end!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_200_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_200_CUT_00.text:
Would any of this have happened
if I'd come home sooner...? Nope! This isn't the time to worry
about junk like that. I need to
focus on the fight in front of me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text: What are we doing here, Ameya?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
We need to win back each color's stronghold
from the Calamity, but I feel as if we're
lacking a little... I dunno. Oomph, maybe?
Like a trump card, y'know?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
On top of that, everyone is exhausted
physically and magically—so I thought
I'd get us all together for a relaxing
little chat!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text: A strategy meeting, in other words.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text: See? You get it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
You have done well, Ameya the Witch.
You have gathered power from witches
of all colors, which makes you worthy to
serve as my successor as the Grey Witch. Take you now the grey staff,
for soon the day will arrive in
which you rule all Pulchra.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
You're talking crazy talk, lady!
I don't want anything to do with
your weird grey stuff!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
This isn't good, Ameya.
She set you up.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text: Muh?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
What exactly were you
talking about there?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
Did you call us all here so you could
steal our magic with that staff!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
I KNEW something was bugging me about how
we suddenly started beating the Calamity!
You planned all of this, didn't you!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
Who knew the Grey Witch I'd heard so
much about would be so near at hand.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
Okay, everybody hold on! This is all
just a huge misunderstanding! Look, no one is more surprised by all this
than me, okay? The Grey Witch just showed up
out of nowhere, said a bunch of creepy stuff,
and shoved this dumb staff into my hands!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
So that was the first time you've
encountered the Grey Witch?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, I mean... No? I guess she showed
up and said more weird stuff to me
when I first came back to Pulchra.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
And you didn't see a reason
to tell us that?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
Enough! This whole conversation
is making me sick!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
Grete, wait! We need to talk about
how to reclaim Castle Black Swan!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
So you can take it for yourself?
No thanks, Ameya.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text: Lita, please! Listen to me!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
I don't want to hear a thing you have
to say right now—because there's no
way I'm going to believe it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
Willma! Red Orchid!
Please, all of you! Wait!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
The Grey Witch timed her appearance perfectly:
she instilled suspicion in the other witches,
then gave us no time to dispel it. Her strategy is clearly to isolate you, Ameya.
And in that isolation, she hopes to manipulate
you into doing her bidding. You must be very
careful about how you proceed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
I know, LoLo, but I'm having a really
tough time right now, okay? I feel like
I just want to hide in a hole and cry. I mean, I thought I'd just come home, get a
perfect score on my Witchterms, and have
Mom tell me how great I am. But instead,
everything is a gigantic MESS!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
We fought so hard against the Calamity,
and we were so stinking close to winning!
But then they all said such horrible things,
even though I didn't do anything wrong!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
You're right, of course.
The Grey Witch is to blame here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
I know—which means I need to
find that jerk and settle this!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text: Which is precisely her plan.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
There's no point trying to stop me, LoLo,
'cause I've gone from feeling bad about
myself to being full-on pissed off! Whatever that lady's plotting,
I'm gonna find it and blow it to bits!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
Well. There's clearly no stopping
you when you get like this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
I bet the door will be open since
I've got this staff with me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
If only that thing were
no more than a key.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text: I know. I'll be careful.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text: Well, huh. I was expecting some sort of welcome, but nobody's here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text: I see only a broken mirror.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
Hey, I bet those fragments I picked up
on the battlefields would fit there!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text: Let's put 'em together!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text: We don't have time for that.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text: Seems like that went well.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
Oh, what a terrible go I've had of it!
That horrid woman is simply FAR too
rough with her mirrors!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text: Did the Grey Witch break you?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text: She sure did, cutie pie!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
Having my own self call me cute is...
Yeah, it's awkward.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
A mirror's job is to show us looking
even cuter than we really are.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text: Okay, MORE awkward now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
But in your case, we also have
THIS to work with! Ooo la la!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
Aw, that's giving me the warm fuzzies.
My time in Miyako City feels like it
happened a million years...

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
Hey! Stop distracting me!
How do you know the Grey Witch!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
The Grey Witch is the lord of the Mistkeep,
and I'm just a little piece of her property.
Basically, she talks and I have to listen.
Rough gig, right? Woof!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
Although since you DID put me back together,
I'll make you a deal. In addition to reflecting
you back thirty percent cuter than you are,
I'll ALSO give you a little tidbit of info!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text: You'd better make it useful.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
I guess that'll depend on you.
Anyway, are you ready? Here it is:
The Grey Witch hates darkness.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
Yeaaah, I dunno. That doesn't come off
as all that useful to me. How about you sweeten the pot, hmm?
Give me just one more thing to work with,
okay? Come on, pleeease? Do it for a
thirty-percent-cuter witch!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
Honey, I'm the one ADDING
that thirty percent. Buuut I suppose giving you a bonus
factoid wouldn't hurt, so here we go!
See, the Grey Witch—

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
I see my chatty little mirror is
sharing half-truths again. SILENCE!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
Well, well, well. Look who
finally decided to show up.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
I thank you for coming here, Ameya Aisling,
witch of the white. And I take it your carrying
that staff means you are prepared to accept
the power of the grey?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
Oh, you take it wrong. I just brought this
staff because I needed it to get in here.
You can keep the stupid thing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
So what's your game here, huh?
Why'd you set up this whole farce
just to get me to come here?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
Rather than questioning me about the farce,
perhaps ask yourself why the other witches
were taken in by it? Is it because they are all fools? No.
It is because they did not—and do not—
trust you. A witch is a creature that thinks only
of herself—and if you look to grow your
own power, you should do the same.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
I will count your tossing aside of the
staff as a momentary lapse of reason.
Now take it up once more, Ameya Aisling!
Claim for yourself the power of the grey!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
For a long time, I didn't understand the
purpose of the Witchterms. I thought they
were just something we did for the sake
of it, you know? But meeting you helped me understand.
Everything that I went through on the
Witchterms was so I'd know what to do
at a time like this!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
I am Ameya Aisling, witch of the white,
and I'll NEVER take the power of the grey! Bummer for you, huh? I mean, considering all
the work you went through setting up this
scheme and how you even shattered your
mirror? Yep. It's a reeeal shame.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
Eee hee hee hee! Stay your pity, girl! All is going according
to my design. Soon I shall lay claim the
Watcher's power you possess and use it to
bring about an end to the Calamity! Then all of Pulchra will be mine! MINE!
So you see, my poor little Ameya,
as far as I'm concerned,
all is proceeding just as planned.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
I have ZERO idea what you're talking about,
but you're clearly trying to confuse me,
and I'm not gonna fall for it! Instead, I'm gonna beat the snot out of you,
regain everyone's trust, and put an end to
this stupid Calamity!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
Did you really think the Grey Witch would
lose to some stripling of a girl who yesterday
was but a fledgling apprentice? But it's not too late, child!
Accept now the power of the grey,
and I will spare your life!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text: No... I will never...

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
It's all right, Ameya. This is Pulchra's fate.
You don't have to risk your life,
and you don't have to fight alone!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
Aw, my sweet little LoLo. I know you just
want to save my life, but I can't listen
to you this time. Not about this...
Because I am a witch of Pulchra!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text: Which means you're not alone!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
I've been hoping for a chance to
tangle with you, Grey Witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
I'm so sorry for everything I said, Ameya!
And I know there's no way to take it back,
but I can at least try to make it right!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
Come on, Ameya! Let's all of us
fight together once more!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
You... You all came. For me.
Oh, thank you so much.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
All right, let's do this!
Let's fight together one last time!
You're going down, Grey Witch—
and then we're going to end the Calamity!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
Eee hee hee! You witches won't
find me such easy prey as all that!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
No! NO! Must I again wait for the next
Calamity!? For the next Watcher!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text: You did it, Ameya!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text: Thank you, Ameya. Truly.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
I think you might be stronger
than the Arch Witch herself.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text: A complete and total victory. Wooo!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
I couldn't have done any of
this without all of you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_C.text:
Oh, but the Brilliant Tower is calling,
which means it's time for me to go.
I'll see you all again later!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.text:
You have done well, Ameya Aisling,
and your actions have brought about
an end to the Calamity.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.text:
Indeed we did. And what's more, you have
proven yourself to be a full-fledged witch
of Pulchra—one who needs no certification
from either myself or the Sages.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.text:
You have. And yet, one task remains:
your duty as a Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.text:
Yeah, the Grey Witch also said
something about that,
but I don't know what it means.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.text:
The Watcher of this Calamity
was you, Ameya. This is the first time the Watcher has ever come
from the ranks of our own witches, so I also
did not understand at first. And as a result,
I placed great burdens upon you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.text:
Okay, but what IS a Watcher?
What am I even supposed to do?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.text:
You must take this Calamity fragment
and make haste away from Pulchra.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.text:
Wait. Does that mean...
I can never come back?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_CUT.text:
No, that's okay! In fact, it's great!
I can't tell you how happy I am that I'm
the one who saved Pulchra, Arch Witch.
That I was...enough. Just tell my mom—I mean, tell the
White Sage that I love her. Okay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
The Grey Witch had overwhelming power,
and I still managed to defeat her.
What even IS this power inside me?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
...LoLo? I think the Brilliant Tower
is telling me that I have the power
to become the Arch Witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
That's just how much you've accomplished,
Ameya. In fact, I think you might be a perfect
fit for the role.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text: Heck yeah, I am!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text: No, LoLo. I'm not ready.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
But the Brilliant Tower is wrong about one thing:
I'm not going to become the Arch Witch. As strong
as I am now, I'd be a fool to settle for something as
insignificant as being the Arch Witch of Pulchra.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text: What are you talking about?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
I understand the man who tried to take
my magic now—and I realize I'm capable
of taking ALL magic for myself and
ruling the Conjoined Worlds! So one day, I'm going to take his
power from HIM! Just you watch!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
...Understood, Ameya. As your familiar,
I shall go where you lead.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Macha
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Do you think I will tolerate such
behavior, Ameya, witch of Pulchra?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Hey there, Goddess! It's been a while.
Oh, and thanks for showing yourself,
because if I don't take you down,
I can't continue on my path.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Macha
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
I did not grant you the magic of the Emerald Beyond only
to stoke the fires of such ambition within you. Does the
Grey Witch's heart perhaps reside within you? ...No, I fear
you simply harbored these feelings from the beginning.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
A witch's heart is a fickle thing—one that
lives for the now. And in THIS now, I think I
want to enjoy this newfound power of mine. So come on, Macha! Let's see just how
tough the goddess of sorcery is!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
I'm going to free the Arch Witch from the crystal, use my power
to bring life back to Pulchra, and be officially deemed a witch!
The order of things might be totally backwards, but everything'll
go back to the way it was originally.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text: A fine idea, Ameya.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Macha
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
I disagree with that assessment,
Ameya, witch of Pulchra.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Goddess Macha? Why are you here?
And HOW are you here!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Macha
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
I am the goddess of sorcery. Where there is
such, I am present—particularly in places
with especially powerful magic.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Macha
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
Right now, Ameya, all of Pulchra's
magic is concentrated in your body.
This noisome little world of magic...

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text: Wait, noisome? Pulchra?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Macha
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
What else would you name a place which
steals the magical energy from other
worlds to use as they please? The witches of Pulchra exist in opposition to
the magical order of the Conjoined Worlds,
and as a goddess, I have long desired to do
something about this place.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
So you USED me!? That attack and your
showing up to give me magic was all
some dumb plan you came up with!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
You're just as bad as the grey witch! No—you're even worse!
Do you know what it FELT like when I went through all that
junk in Miyako City!? And then again in the other worlds!?
And then AGAIN here in Pulchra!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Macha
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
All I have done, I did for the sake of the
magical order of the Conjoined Worlds, Ameya.
And with your task complete, give me now the
magic you have gathered and let us end this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
You don't even get why I'm upset, do you?
You think that because you're some hotshot
goddess people are just gonna be okay with
you doing whatever you want?

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
No way, sister! Everyone else in all
the worlds may be willing to let you
off the hook, but I NEVER will!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text:
I am power! I am a GOD!
AAAAAAH HA HA HA HA!

SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_CUT.text: Thanks, everybody!

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_010_06.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_010_06.text:
To be honest, I also hoped you'd
completely fill the Crystal Cage.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.text:
Oh, perhaps a bit. You were a little desperate
there when it came to reclaiming your power.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_07.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_07.text: Hey, it's not like I forgot to gather mana! I just wanted to get my power back right away.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_08.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_08.text:
Now's not the time to be having yourself
a little pity party. The fight against the
Calamity is imminent.

SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_06.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_06.text:
I couldn't say; this is my first experience
with this kind of thing.
